heroSubtitle: Professional piano lessons from the comfort of your home via Microsoft Teams
privateDescription: One-on-one instruction tailored to your goals and skill level. Available for beginners to advanced pianists of all ages.
specialDescription: Focused courses on specific skills like jazz improvisation, classical repertoire, music theory, or exam preparation.
step1Desc: Choose your package and schedule a time that works for you.
step2Desc: Ensure you have a keyboard/piano, Microsoft Teams installed, and a stable internet connection.
step3Desc: Click the Teams link sent to your email at your scheduled lesson time.
step4Desc: Enjoy your lesson and follow the personalized practice plan between sessions.
footerDescription: Professional Piano Instruction via Microsoft Teams
name: Name *

PleaseEnterYourNameAndEmail: Please enter your name and email
bioIntro: Hello! I'm Stefan Aleksovski, a professional pianist with over 10 years of teaching experience. I hold a Master's degree in Piano Performance from Faculty of Music in North Macedonia and have performed in venues across the world.
bioPhilosophy: My teaching philosophy focuses on developing proper technique, musical understanding, and a genuine love for music. I believe that every student has unique potential, and I tailor my lessons to meet individual needs and goals.
bookingConfirmed: Booking Confirmed! Check your email for further steps.
freeTrialEmailMessage: Your free trial lesson has been successfully booked.
paymentInstruction: Please complete your booking by paying {{price}} via PayPal.
